doc.title: Megadeth Blood in the Water: Live in San Diego
doc.plot: Pioneers of the American thrash metal genre, Megadeth has become one of the most commercially successful heavy metal bands of all time. They perform to a raucous hometown crowd at the Cox Arena in San Diego, California on the 2008 Gigantour tour. Dave Mustaine and Megadeth push the limit, playing faster and heavier than ever in the ultimate Megadeth experience.
